---
title: "02_clean"
format: html
---

Load the Dataset

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

kidney_raw <- read_csv("../data/kidney_disease.csv")

```

Changing the column names

```{r}
kidney_clean <- kidney_raw %>%
  rename(
    id = id,
    age = age,
    blood_pressure = bp,
    specific_gravity = sg,
    albumin = al,
    sugar = su,
    red_blood_cells = rbc,
    pus_cells = pc,
    pus_cell_clumps = pcc,
    bacteria = ba,
    blood_glucose_random = bgr,
    blood_urea = bu,
    serum_creatinine = sc,
    sodium = sod,
    potassium = pot,
    hemoglobin = hemo,
    packed_cell_volume = pcv,
    white_blood_cell_count = wc,
    red_blood_cell_count = rc,
    hypertension = htn,
    diabetes_mellitus = dm,
    coronary_artery_disease = cad,
    appetite = appet,
    pedal_edema = pe,
    anemia = ane,
    classification = classification
  )
write_tsv(kidney_clean, "../data/02_dat_clean.tsv")
```

Changing values to 0s and 1s

```{r}
library(dplyr)

kidney_clean_binary <- kidney_clean %>%
  mutate(
    red_blood_cells = as.numeric(red_blood_cells == "normal"),
    pus_cells = as.numeric(pus_cells == "normal"),
    pus_cell_clumps = as.numeric(pus_cell_clumps == "present"),
    bacteria = as.numeric(bacteria == "present"),
    hypertension = as.numeric(hypertension == "no"),
    diabetes_mellitus = as.numeric(diabetes_mellitus == "no"),
    coronary_artery_disease = as.numeric(coronary_artery_disease == "no"),
    appetite = as.numeric(appetite == "yes"),
    pedal_edema = as.numeric(pedal_edema == "no"),
    anemia = as.numeric(anemia == "no")
  )

write_tsv(kidney_clean_binary, "../data/02_dat_clean_binary.tsv")
```
